name: Lucy the Useless Lesbian
description:
So, this is a demo for my very first game, Lucy the Useless Lesbian. It details a world in which people take TV way too seriously, and so they fight for the right to be on TV. Each network has their own skyscraper, with each floor being dedicated to a different show. The higher your floor, the better time slot and resources you get. And here we meet our main character Lucy, who has never won a fight. Ever.

Look, it's just a silly, super gay game that I wanted to make, based off of various over the top battle manga >_<
